name: What Makes a Heart Beat
description:
Hello everyone and thank you for takin a look at this!
A game in development made for #AlternativeEngineJam. Also my first attempt in a long time to make something playable. Made with UPBGE.
Honestly there is so much more I want to add to this and there are quite many things to polish. To count a few:
- Longer level
- Textures
- Sounds
- A bit improved controls
- More levels that are unlockable and each are a different little mini game that somehow relates to the game jam theme and the title of the game, making somewhat of a narrative together.
At the moment, I think it does follow the theme of the game jam quite well as erythrocytes are definitely a part of what makes us alive - a particle of life. I'm happy that for now at least I have something with beginning, a bit of gameplay and end. Also the level generate randomly from given parts. And I know there is a little glitch with health bar for now.
- DevLog of this is in the process and will be posted a later today or tomorrow on YT.
Controls:
A - Move to right side
D - Move to left side
Esc - Exit game
